Draw Rectangles

  1. 1. Represent each rectangle on grid paper:
    • \(\frac{1}{2}\) unit by 1 unit
    • \(\frac{1}{2}\) unit by 2 units
    • \(\frac{1}{2}\) unit by 3 units
    • \(\frac{1}{2}\) unit by 4 units
  2. 2. Find the area of each rectangle that you drew.
  3. 3. What information do you need to find the area of the shaded region?
